author: adrianc
msg: This commit fixes the bug reported in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1488 and it includes a few of the improvements mentioned in https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-1485. This commit also lays the groundwork for improved properties file support in the future.
This commit contains a new xsd file - it needs to be included on the apache ofbiz website. XML properties files will generate console error messages until it is.

author: ferdinand
msg: corrected occurrences of region-before before region-body

author: hboutemy
msg: avoid NPE when pom.properties not found. Merged 603020 from trunk
